sentences.sContent: 6--biological urge to maim, and maul, and…

sentences.sContent: Shuai Zi followed D elder brother, and clever clever love objects at the same time by father, be mixed odd for D elder brother in the Shuai Zi in basketball game maul, clever clever extremely sad.
sentences.sContent_eng: Shuai Zi followed D elder brother, and clever clever love objects at the same time by father, be mixed odd for D elder brother in the Shuai Zi in basketball game maul, clever clever extremely sad.
sentences.sCn: 帅子跟了D哥，和妙妙的爱情同时遭到父亲反对，在篮球比赛中帅子为D哥出头被混混打伤，妙妙伤心欲绝。

synos.tran: 打伤；殴打；抨击；粗暴对待
